plot outline: Story revolves around a girl having Vitiligo and her relationship with her lover or would be life-partner and his family. Film highlights the social stigma around around Vitiligo. Film is produced by Dr. Maya Tulpule (Shweta association - Vitiligo Support Group).
title: Nital
plot: Story revolves around a girl having Vitiligo and her relationship with her lover or would be life-partner and his family. Film highlights the social stigma around around Vitiligo. Film is produced by Dr. Maya Tulpule (Shweta association - Vitiligo Support Group).
